title: Sol Sol Lyrics Thalaivaa Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Sol Sol
Singer: Vijay Prakash, Abhay Jodhpurkar, Megha
Movie: Thalaivaa
Music: GV Prakash
Lyrics: Na Muthukumar		 Other Song Lyrics:
Tamil PasangaYaar Indha Saalai OramSol Sol SolVanganna Vanakanganna
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Sol sol sol anbae nee sol
nil nil nil pogadhey nil
sol sol sol sollaamal sol
solvadhellaam kannale sol

Oru nenjil modhiyadhum
kadhal saaral ennai thaakka
andhi maalai sooriyanum
merkil vandhu nindru
unnai ennai ondru serkka

Ennaennavo thondrudhey en peney
un nerukkam vendudhey
kanney kanney    ..(Sol sol sol)

Oru nenjil modhiyadhum
kadhal saaral ennai thaakka
andhi maalai sooriyanum
merkil vandhu nindru
unnai ennai ondru serkka

Kanavugal ketkudhu nee vara
kai viral ketkudhu nee thoda

yaro ennai paarkum oru
ennam thondirda
neeye endru paarpen
adhai engae sollida

en neram indru avasaramaai
maariponadhey
En seigai indru ragasiyamaai
ennai aaludhey

Imaigalil pani thuli vizhuvadhum
vayil vandhum adhu mela ezhuvadhum
iyarkayil nadakira ragasiyam
anbae anbae..  ..(Sol sol sol)

Oru nenjil modhiyadhum
kadhal saaral ennai thaakka
andhi maalai sooriyanum
merkil vandhu nindru
unnai ennai ondru serkka

Iruvarum oru mozhi pesalaam
idayunil mounathil pesalaam
penneae nejam ennum kootai thirakka
kannae un kangal adhu saavi koduka

en perinil endhan perinai serkka
aasai vandhadhey
un thozhil endhan thozh vandhu saaya
neram vandhadhey

idhu idhu idhu oru inbamaa
idhu idhu idhu oru thunbamaa
inbamum thunbamum serndhadhaa
solvaai pennae ..(Sol sol sol)
Sol sol sol anbae nee sol ...

seo.description: Get the complete Sol Sol Lyrics Thalaivaa Songs Lyrics from Thalaivaa. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by GV PrakashKumar and sung by Abhay Jodhpurkar. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
